rows.label: qst104201_msg0001
rows.name: Well, this is a bit of a pickle.

rows.label: qst104201_msg0002
rows.name:
Well, there's a bit of a
problem with the village's
children, you see...

rows.label: qst104201_msg0003
rows.name:
It's just that...well, as I'm sure
you know, the Holy See of Acedia was
destroyed in that great conflict.

rows.label: qst104201_msg0004
rows.name:
And thanks to that, our
Martis can't go to the
Acedian Academy any more.

rows.label: qst104201_msg0005
rows.name:
We don't have anywhere to send the
children for a good education...

rows.label: qst104201_msg0007
rows.name:
Maybe we could fix up this building
that nobody's using right now...

rows.label: qst104201_msg0008
rows.name:
Round up some good teachers
from all around Alst...

rows.label: qst104201_msg0009
rows.name:
And start a brand-new school
right here in Iyasaki!

rows.label: qst104201_msg0010
rows.name: Oh! Well, I'm happy to hear it.

rows.label: qst104201_msg0011
rows.name:
First thing we've got to
do is get the school
building in workable shape.

rows.label: qst104201_msg0012
rows.name:
It's falling apart here and there
after years of disuse, you see.

rows.label: qst104201_msg0013
rows.name:
You'll find a carpenter
out back, name of Hummer.

rows.label: qst104201_msg0014
rows.name:
He's working out what needs to be
done. Could you lend him a hand?

rows.label: qst104201_msg0015
rows.name:
Let's make this village
a place where children
can be proud to grow up!

rows.label: qst104201_msg0101
rows.name:
I hope to see this become a place where
children can learn, grow, and foster
the skills they'll need in life.
